title: Parthenion
description: On a hill southwest of the modern Greek town of Partheni, a fortified Classical-Hellenistic settlement has been identified with the attested ancient Eritrean deme of Parthenion.

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 5451
